idea-plugin.name: SmartQQ
idea-plugin.description:
An anti-boss plugin for you to chat with your QQ/Wechat friends privately.
一个防Boss的QQ/微信聊天插件，让老板以为你是在写代码，其实，你是在聊天，不过，做为程序猿，怎么可能有时间聊天，哈哈。
about more: https://github.com/Jamling/SmartQQ4Intellij/
